quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
author: Al McGuire

quote: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
author: Alan Dundes

quote: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Men marry women with the hope they will never change. Women marry men with the hope they will change. Invariably they are both disappointed.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: All the things I really like to do are either immoral, illegal or fattening.
author: Alexander Woollcott

quote: War is God’s way of teaching Americans geography.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: It would be nice to spend billions on schools and roads, but right now that money is desperately needed for political ads.
author: Andy Borowitz

quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: At every party there are two kinds of people – those who want to go home and those who don’t. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.
author: Ann Landers

quote: If you want your children to listen, try talking softly to someone else.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Doctors are just the same as lawyers; the only difference is that lawyers merely rob you, whereas doctors rob you and kill you too.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: I don’t believe in astrology; I’m a Sagittarius and we’re skeptical.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: My opinions may have changed, but not the fact that I’m right.
author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quote: To be sure of hitting the target, shoot first, and call whatever you hit the target.
author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quote: Trouble knocked at the door, but, hearing laughter, hurried away.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Have you noticed that all the people in favor of birth control are already born?
author: Benny Hill

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Most people would sooner die than think; in fact, they do so.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Facebook just sounds like a drag, in my day seeing pictures of peoples vacations was considered a punishment.
author: Betty White

quote: Everything that used to be a sin is now a disease.
author: Bill Maher

quote: If there is anything the nonconformist hates worse than a conformist, it’s another nonconformist who doesn’t conform to the prevailing standard of nonconformity.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: Money won’t buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Before you judge a man, walk a mile in his shoes. After that who cares?… He’s a mile away and you’ve got his shoes!
author: Billy Connolly

quote: I’ve always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
author: Billy Sunday

quote: If you’re going to tell people the truth, be funny or they’ll kill you.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don’t need it.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Inside me there’s a thin person struggling to get out, but I can usually sedate him with four or five cupcakes.
author: Bob Thaves

quote: We never really grow up, we only learn how to act in public.
author: Bryan White

quote: As a child my family’s menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
author: Buddy Hackett

quote: But the fact that some geniuses were laughed at does not imply that all who are laughed at are geniuses. They laughed at Columbus, they laughed at Fulton, they laughed at the Wright Brothers. But they also laughed at Bozo the Clown.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: My favorite machine at the gym is the vending machine.
author: Caroline Rhea

quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: He who laughs last didn’t get the joke.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: Don’t worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: By the time a man realizes that his father was right, he has a son who thinks he’s wrong.
author: Charles Wadsworth

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Political correctness is tyranny with manners.
author: Charlton Heston

quote: High heels were invented by a woman who had been kissed on the forehead.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: If you love something set it free, but don’t be surprised if it comes back with herpes.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: When I was a boy I was told that anybody could become President. I’m beginning to believe it.
author: Clarence Darrow

quote: A stockbroker urged me to buy a stock that would triple its value every year. I told him, ‘At my age, I don’t even buy green bananas.'
author: Claude Pepper

quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: I’m too drunk to taste this chicken.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: A study in the Washington Post says that women have better verbal skills than men. I just want to say to the authors of that study: ‘Duh.'
author: Conan O’Brien

quote: Starbucks says they are going to start putting religious quotes on cups. The very first one will say, ‘Jesus! This cup is expensive!'
author: Conan O’Brien

quote: Laughing at our mistakes can lengthen our own life. Laughing at someone else’s can shorten it.
author: Cullen Hightower

quote: If you can’t live without me, why aren’t you dead already?
author: Cynthia Heimel

quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Education is learning what you didn’t even know you didn’t know.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: It is a scientific fact that your body will not absorb cholesterol if you take it from another person’s plate.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Never under any circumstances take a sleeping pill and a laxative on the same night.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I used to jog but the ice cubes kept falling out of my glass.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: Everyone has a purpose in life. Perhaps yours is watching television.
author: David Letterman

quote: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: A failure is like fertilizer; it stinks to be sure, but it makes things grow faster in the future.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Biologically speaking, if something bites you it’s more likely to be female.
author: Desmond Morris

quote: As long as people will accept crap, it will be financially profitable to dispense it.
author: Dick Cavett

quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
author: Don Marquis

quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: Never doubt the courage of the French. They were the ones who discovered that snails are edible.
author: Doug Larson

quote: To err is human; to admit it, superhuman.
author: Doug Larson

quote: Human beings, who are almost unique in having the ability to learn from the experience of others, are also remarkable for their apparent disinclination to do so.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don’t know the answer.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable.There is another theory which states that this has already happened.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Don’t cry because it’s over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I was born to make mistakes, not to fake perfection.
author: Drake

quote: An alcoholic is someone you don’t like who drinks as much as you do.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Analyzing humor is like dissecting a frog. Few people are interested and the frog dies of it.
author: E. B. White

quote: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: The duty of a patriot is to protect his country from its government.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: A woman is like a tea bag – you can’t tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She’s ninety-seven now, and we don’t know where the hell she is.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
author: Emo Philips

quote: How many people here have telekenetic powers? Raise my hand.
author: Emo Philips

quote: I asked God for a bike, but I know God doesn’t work that way. So I stole a bike and asked for forgiveness.
author: Emo Philips

quote: Leave something for someone but dont leave someone for something.
author: Enid Blyton

quote: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I drink to make other people more interesting.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Great art is the contempt of a great man for small art.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: You’re only as good as your last haircut.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Good advice is something a man gives when he is too old to set a bad example.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Marriage is the only war in which you sleep with the enemy.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I can’t understand why a person will take a year to write a novel when he can easily buy one for a few dollars.
author: Fred Allen

quote: The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion.
author: Fred Allen

quote: Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all others because you were born in it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: If you live to be one hundred, you’ve got it made. Very few people die past that age.
author: George Burns

quote: You know you’re getting old when you stoop to tie your shoelaces and wonder what else you could do while you’re down there.
author: George Burns

quote: Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?
author: George Carlin

quote: I was thinking about how people seem to read the Bible a whole lot more as they get older; then it dawned on me – they’re cramming for their final exam.
author: George Carlin

quote: I’m in shape. Round is a shape.
author: George Carlin

quote: If you try to fail, and succeed, which have you done?
author: George Carlin

quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
author: George Carlin

quote: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
author: George Carlin

quote: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
author: George Carlin

quote: To those of you who received honours, awards and distinctions, I say well done. And to the C students, I say you, too, can be president of the United States.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Whoever said money can’t buy happiness didn’t know where to shop.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: A black cat crossing your path signifies that the animal is going somewhere.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Behind every successful man is a woman, behind her is his wife.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Here’s to our wives and girlfriends…may they never meet!
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: If you find it hard to laugh at yourself, I would be happy to do it for you.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Marriage is the chief cause of divorce.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: A judge is a law student who marks his own examination papers.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: The two most common elements in the universe are hydrogen and stupidity.
author: Harlan Ellison

quote: It’s only when you look at an ant through a magnifying glass on a sunny day that you realize how often they burst into flames.
author: Harry Hill

quote: It’s a recession when your neighbor loses his job; it’s a depression when you lose yours.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: Before marriage, a man declares that he would lay down his life to serve you; after marriage, he won’t even lay down his newspaper to talk to you.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Life begins at 40 – but so do fallen arches, rheumatism, faulty eyesight, and the tendency to tell a story to the same person, three or four times.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: I’ve got all the money I’ll ever need, if I die by four o’clock.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: If you’re going to do something tonight that you’ll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: All men are equal before fish.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: You tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is ‘never try.'
author: Homer Simpson

quote: My grandfather once told me that there were two kinds of people: those who do the work and those who take the credit. He told me to try to be in the first group; there was much less competition.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: I’d rather have 1% of the effort of 100 men than 100% of my own effort.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: My wife Mary and I have been married for forty-seven years and not once have we had an argument serious enough to consider divorce; murder, yes, but divorce, never.
author: Jack Benny

quote: Money is not the most important thing in the world. Love is. Fortunately, I love money.
author: Jackie Mason

quote: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
author: James Thurber

quote: When we talk to God, we’re praying. When God talks to us, we’re schizophrenic.
author: Jane Wagner

quote: Men are like shoes. Some fit better than others. And sometimes you go out shopping and there’s nothing you like. And then, as luck would have it, the next week you find two that are perfect, but you don’t have the money to buy both.
author: ” – Janet Evanovich

quote: According to a new survey, 90% of men say their lover is also their best friend. Which is really kind of disturbing when you consider man’s best friend is his dog.
author: Jay Leno

quote: Here’s something to think about: How come you never see a headline like ‘Psychic Wins Lottery’?
author: Jay Leno

quote: My pessimism extends to the point of even suspecting the sincerity of other pessimists.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: Haters are just confused admirers because they can’t figure out the reason why everyone loves you.
author: Jeffree Star

quote: It’s amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Laugh a lot. It burns a lot of calories.
author: Jessica Simpson

quote: Avoid fruits and nuts. You are what you eat.
author: Jim Davis

quote: The simple act of opening a bottle of wine has brought more happiness to the human race than all the collective governments in the history of earth.
author: Jim Harrison

quote: Americans are incredibly inpatient. Someone once said that the shortest period of time in America is the time between when the light turns green and when you hear the first horn honk.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Age is just a number. It’s totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
author: Joan Collins

quote: Why is there so much month left at the end of the money?
author: John Barrymore

quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I’ve come to view Jesus much the way I view Elvis. I love the guy but the fan clubs really freak me out.
author: John Fugelsang

quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you don’t stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
author: John Hughes

quote: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Life is hard; it’s harder if you’re stupid.
author: John Wayne

quote: If life was fair, Elvis would be alive and all the impersonators would be dead.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed.
author: Josh Billings

quote: The greatest thief this world has ever produced is procrastination, and he is still at large.
author: Josh Billings

quote: The secret of the demagogue is to make himself as stupid as his audience so they believe they are clever as he.
author: Karl Kraus

quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
author: Lana Turner

quote: That’s the funny thing about life. We’re rarely aware of the bullets we dodge. The just-misses. The almost-never-happeneds. We spend so much time worrying about how the future is going to play out and not nearly enough time admiring the precious perfection of the present.
author: Lauren Miller

quote: A man doesn’t know what he knows until he knows what he doesn’t know.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: If you’re too open-minded; your brains will fall out.
author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: The road to success is always under construction.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Until you value yourself, you won’t value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: Don’t keep a man guessing too long – he’s sure to find the answer somewhere else.
author: Mae West

quote: I’m not for everyone. I’m barely for me.
author: Marc Maron

quote: Cleaning up with children around is like shoveling during a blizzard.
author: Margaret Culkin Banning

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don’t mind, it doesn’t matter.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I am only human, although I regret it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I would have written a shorter letter, but I did not have the time.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don’t want, drink what you don’t like, and do what you’d rather not.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Worrying is like paying a debt you don’t owe.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Do not make the mistake of treating your dogs like humans or they will treat you like dogs.
author: Martha Scott

quote: Son, if you really want something in this life, you have to work for it. Now quiet! They’re about to announce the lottery numbers.
author: Matt Groening

quote: God is at home, it’s we who have gone out for a walk.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: In the past 10,000 years, humans have devised roughly 100,000 religions based on roughly 2,500 gods. So the only difference between myself and the believers is that I am skeptical of 2,500 gods whereas they are skeptical of 2,499 gods. We’re only one God away from total agreement.
author: Michael Shermer

quote: My theory is that all of Scottish cuisine is based on a dare.
author: Mike Myers

quote: Knowledge is knowing a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
author: Miles Kington

quote: A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours.
author: Milton Berle

quote: If evolution really works, how come mothers only have two hands?
author: Milton Berle

quote: My doctor told me that jogging could add years to my life. I think he was right. I feel ten years older already.
author: Milton Berle

quote: I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I prefer someone who burns the flag and then wraps themselves up in the Constitution over someone who burns the Constitution and then wraps themselves up in the flag.
author: Molly Ivins

quote: It’s just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: God did not intend religion to be an exercise club.
author: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he is a baby.
author: Natalie Wood

quote: It’s always darkest before the dawn. So if you’re going to steal your neighbor’s newspaper, that’s the time to do it.
author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: The only thing that stops God from sending another flood is that the first one was useless.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: When you go into court you are putting your fate into the hands of twelve people who weren’t smart enough to get out of jury duty.
author: Norm Crosby

quote: As you get older three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can’t remember the other two.
author: Norman Wisdom

quote: Ask me no questions, and I’ll tell you no lies.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: If you must make a noise, make it quietly.
author: Oliver Hardy

quote: A woman’s mind is cleaner than a man’s: She changes it more often.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: Man has his will, but woman has her way.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I’m schizophrenic, and so am I.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: There’s a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: What the world needs is more geniuses with humility; there are so few of us left.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Always forgive your enemies – nothing annoys them so much.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I can stand brute force, but brute reason is quite unbearable. There is something unfair about its use. It is hitting below the intellect.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Of all the things I’ve lost I miss my mind the most.
author: Ozzy Osbourne

quote: The only reason some people get lost in thought is because it’s unfamiliar territory.
author: Paul Fix

quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
author: Paul R. Ehrlich

quote: I have learned from my mistakes, and I am sure I can repeat them exactly.
author: Peter Cook

quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn’t afford. Then I want to move in with them.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: We spend the first twelve months of our children’s lives teaching them to walk and talk and the next twelve telling them to sit down and shut up.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it’s either a new car or a new wife.
author: Prince Philip

quote: Life is a sexually transmitted disease.
author: R. D. Laing

quote: I dream of a better tomorrow, where chickens can cross the road and not be questioned about their motives.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.
author: Redd Foxx

quote: The less Holy Spirit we have, the more cake and coffee we need to keep the church going.
author: Reinhard Bonnke

quote: If you lived with a roommate as unstable as this economic system, you would’ve moved out or demanded that your roommate get professional help.
author: Richard D. Wolff

quote: When you’re in love it’s the most glorious two and a half days of your life.
author: Richard Lewis

quote: Lead me not into temptation; I can find the way myself.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: I love being married. It’s so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: When I eventually met Mr. Right I had no idea that his first name was Always.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: If you have a secret, people will sit a little bit closer.
author: Rob Corddry

quote: I have tried to know absolutely nothing about a great many things, and I have succeeded fairly well.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: The man who smiles when things go wrong has thought of someone to blame it on.
author: Robert Bloch

quote: All my life I’ve wanted, just once, to say something clever without losing my train of thought.
author: Robert Breault

quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness — and call it love — true love.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: Older people shouldn’t eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.
author: Robert Orben

quote: I’m sorry, if you were right, I’d agree with you.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
author: Robin Williams

quote: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: My psychiatrist told me I was crazy and I said I want a second opinion. He said okay, you’re ugly too.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: We sleep in separate rooms, we have dinner apart, we take separate vacations – we’re doing everything we can to keep our marriage together.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade… And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
author: Ron White

quote: It’s true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Recession is when a neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Have no fear of perfection. You’ll never reach it.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Inflation is when you pay fifteen dollars for the ten-dollar haircut you used to get for five dollars when you had hair.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: A verbal contract isn’t worth the paper it’s written on.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I don’t think anyone should write their autobiography until after they’re dead.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I don’t want any yes-men around me. I want everybody to tell me the truth even if it costs them their job.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I wish I were dumber so I could be more certain about my opinions. It looks fun.
author: Scott Adams

quote: If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?
author: Scott Adams

quote: I live by my own rules (reviewed, revised, and approved by my wife).. but still my own.
author: Si Robertson

quote: The trouble with telling a good story is that it invariably reminds the other fellow of a dull one.
author: Sid Caesar

quote: Children today are tyrants. They contradict their parents, gobble their food, and tyrannize their teachers.
author: Socrates

quote: You cannot be anything if you want to be everything.
author: Solomon Schechter

quote: If any of you cry at my funeral I’ll never speak to you again.
author: Stan Laurel

quote: Folks, I don’t trust children. They’re here to replace us.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: Crocodiles are easy. They try to kill and eat you. People are harder. Sometimes they pretend to be your friend first.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
author: Steve Martin

quote: It does not matter whether you win or lose, what matters is whether I win or lose!
author: Steven Weinberg

quote: A clear conscience is usually the sign of a bad memory.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
author: Steven Wright

quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
author: Steven Wright

quote: To steal ideas from one person is plagiarism; to steal from many is research.
author: Steven Wright

quote: You can’t have everything. Where would you put it?
author: Steven Wright

quote: When I hear somebody sigh, ‘Life is hard,’ I am always tempted to ask, ‘Compared to what?'
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: The world is a globe. The farther you sail, the closer to home you are.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn’t sit for a month.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Happiness is an imaginary condition, formerly attributed by the living to the dead, now usually attributed by adults to children, and by children to adults.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: I know that there are people who do not love their fellow man, and I hate people like that!
author: Tom Lehrer

quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
author: Voltaire

quote: I hate women because they always know where things are.
author: Voltaire

quote: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Always carry a flagon of whiskey in case of snakebite and furthermore always carry a small snake.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There’s no point in being a damn fool about it.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: We are all here on earth to help others. What on earth the others are here for I don’t know.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: My doctor gave me six months to live, but when I couldn’t pay the bill he gave me six months more.
author: Walter Matthau

quote: Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world.
author: Wilhelm II

quote: Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Will Rogers

quote: When I die, I want to die like my grandfather who died peacefully in his sleep. Not screaming like all the passengers in his car.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Common sense and a sense of humor are the same thing, moving at different speeds. A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing.
author: William James

quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you’ve stood up for something, sometime in your life.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I don’t want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve it through not dying.
author: Woody Allen

quote: I’m such a good lover because I practice a lot on my own.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Marriage is like mushrooms: we notice too late if they are good or bad.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Everybody laughs the same in every language because laughter is a universal connection.
author: Yakov Smirnoff

quote: Always go to other people’s funerals, otherwise they won’t come to yours.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: If you come to a fork in the road, take it.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You’ve got to be very careful if you don’t know where you are going, because you might not get there.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing – that’s why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he’s finished.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
